title: WorkAudioBook - Audiobook player for language learners with Subt
description:
It is a MP3 player tuned to help you study foreign language using audiobooks, podcasts or movies audio tracks. 

Unlike ordinary music players, it works in terms of phrases, not seconds. 

You can easily repeat phrases, select next or previous phrase, select the specific word that you haven't understood. 

Player can make auto-pauses between phrases. 

Subtitles are supported.
